title: Refugee crisis: Britain should not let Syrian children freeze to death, says Yvette Cooper
text: Britain should not “stand on the sidelines” while " children freeze to death " in refugee camps, defeated Labour leadership candidate Yvette Cooper will say. The former shadow Home Secretary will say the Government must remove refugees from
